name: Five night's in Anime: Another Story 3
name_original: Five night's in Anime: Another Story 3
description:
The past can be too heavy to carry around with you everywhere. Sometimes it's worth forgetting about it for the sake of the future. J.K. Rowling

__________________________________________________________________

A direct continuation of "Fnia Another Story 2". The events in this novel take place a few days after the end of the second part..........After Bonnie agreed to go with Alex, she began a new life that was unusual for her. Living an active and very happy life, she rightfully becomes part of Alex and Alice's small family. At one point, Alex learns very important information for him and there is only one thing that needs to be completed.........But will everything go according to plan when someone is hunting for him?

__________________________________________________________________

!!!!!PAY ATTENTION!!!!! This novel was created solely for entertainment purposes. The novel does not carry a message to offend someone(Or something). Any coincidences with real people(Both alive and dead) are considered random. Neither I or anyone else except you is responsible for what happens to you after reading the novel.(You make the decision to play).
